name: the Watchful Eye (jiumycr)
description:
It shows a social phenomenon that all the individuals in society are watched by people around, and they have to give up their uniqueness and other qualities to cater to social rules.

In this game, the players rotate the abstract models, and there will be corresponding projections on the wall. The models are like our qualities and we must become the good man in other people's eyes.

The players should use the mouse or the finger to rotate the models. If the models are rotated to the right angle, and the projection on the wall is the proper shape, the model will move up and leave. Then the next model will enter the room. In each room, there will be three models.
